name: Aim Rise
description:
You are in a strange electronic complex, surrounded by murderous robots.
You have to hide and trick them with your aiming skills to escape!
 WARNING: the sound is sometimes loud!

GAME MADE BY LYNOX AND VEINARDY

Music by DRAGONBLASTER

(Controls will be custom)
Forward/Left/Backward/Right : W / A / S / D
Aim object : Hold Right click
Throw object : Left click while aiming
Interact: E
